properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 220259Z JUL BY
   M/V RAMFORM VALIANT TOWING 14 8100 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BETWEEN
   24-24.2S 25-39.0S AND 044-17.2W 043-41.4W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1019/11(37), AIDS RESTORED.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 220359Z JUL.
